file_content.text: Where is Admiral Davos? I did not invite servants!
I act in the admiral's name. I'll show you.
Getting audio only. Can you see anything?
That's Captain Furth, one of the admiral's men. I don't know the pirate.
I recognize one.
Pour some wine and find a private room, and I'll tell you all about it when I get back.
[Flirt] Hello again.
Nicely done. It's a meeting between Davos's man and the pirates, all right.
You were right about this.
Now's not the time, Ensign.
Quiet!
There. Begin playback.
Pashok the Unyielding. I am honored by your invitation.
I am Admiral Davos, and I fought in the Battle of Hoth. Unlike my peers, I was left to the icy wastes.
For six months, I wandered the wreckage. As I lost my... vitality, I found many items of great value.
Weapons. Artifacts. Even a Republic shuttle full of secrets. I hid them in the starship graveyard so that I might one day claim my prize.
Today's that day. Give us safe passage into the starship graveyard, and we'll all leave rich.
Hey, agent? Might want to see this.
We apologize, agent, but you may want to see this.
You may want to cut your observations short.
Say... I'm picking up some weird background noise....
I'll be with you in a moment.
Just give me one second...
Yes?
Shaggy man. Hey, ugly--gonna make a towel out of you.
The wildlife has taken an interest in us. We should be flattered....
The locals don't appreciate us using their cave.
Step away from the camera, sir. You've got visitors.
I'm sort of in the middle of something.
Not now!
Son of a--behind you!
Cipher! Wampa!
I really think you should turn around.
